name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ApplyEngine: AI-automated autofill, resume and cover letter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for autofilling job applications, generating custom resumes and cover letters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Transform Your Job Application Process with ApplyEngine.AI
The ultimate AI-powered Chrome extension that makes applying to jobs faster and smarter than ever before.

😩 Tired of Repeatedly Filling Out the Same Information?
ApplyEngine.AI automatically fills job applications, tailors your resume, and generates personalized cover letters - all powered by advanced AI technology. Simply upload your resume once, and let our intelligent system handle the rest.

🌟 Key Features, always ***FREE***:   

🧠 Unlimited Intelligent AutoFill: Automatically detects and fills job application forms.
📄 Unlimited Smart Resume Tailoring: Customizes your resume for each job using AI.
✉️ Unlimited Cover Letter Generation: Creates compelling, job-specific cover letters.
✅ ATS-Friendly: Ensures your applications pass Applicant Tracking Systems.
🔑 Bring Your Own Key (BYOK): Securely input your own OpenAI API key to control AI budget.
🌐 Major Platform Support: Works seamlessly with LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, and more.

Additionally, unlock premium features with a small one-time fee. Premium offers essential enhancements for productivity and privacy:

🔒 Privacy-First Approach: With Premium, all your data can remains secure and stored locally on your device, ensuring complete privacy.
📥 Data Export/Import: Easily download, backup, and transfer your data across devices.
✉️ Priority Email Support: Get help when you need it, ensuring you’re never left in the dark.
✨ Premium Features: Gain free access to all new premium features and improvements for 12 months after purchase.
🗳️ Vote on Roadmap Features: Help shape the future of ApplyEngine.AI by voting on upcoming features that matter to you.

👥 Who Is This For?
* Job seekers tired of repetitive application processes
* Professionals looking to optimize their job search
* Anyone who values privacy and data control
* Students entering the job market
* Career changers applying to multiple positions

🚀 Get Started Now

1. Download the Free Version: Start by downloading the free version of our Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store. Experience all the features without any commitment!
2. Upgrade to Premium: Once you're ready to unlock persistent data storage and additional premium features, purchase the Premium version license.
3. Activate Your License: After purchasing, you will receive a license key. Enter this key in the Chrome extension to start enjoying all the premium features immediately!

📮 Support
Need help? Premium users get priority email support. 
Contact: applyengine.ai@gmail.com

🛠️ Technical Requirements
Works on Chromium based browser on any OS
Requires OpenAI API key (instructions provided)

⏳ Save Hours of Time!
Increase your chances of landing interviews with ApplyEngine.AI. Whether you're actively job hunting or just exploring opportunities, our extension streamlines the entire application process while maintaining the quality of your applications.

🏃‍♂️ Ready to Transform Your Job Search?
Experience the future of job applications with ApplyEngine.

#jobsearch #automation #AI #productivity
